        Constructor
        Parameters:
        aParticlePairKey - Particle-pair key
        aBondLength - Bond length in DPD units
        aForceConstant - Spring force constant in DPD units
        anIsRepulsion - True: Repulsion for bond is to be calculated, false: Otherwise (no repulsion, attraction only)

        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if an argument is illegal
